about.name: About
about.vita3k: Vita3K: a PS Vita/PS TV Emulator. The world's first functional PS Vita/PS TV emulator.
about.about_vita3k: Vita3K is an experimental open-source PlayStation Vita/PlayStation TV emulator written in C++ for Windows, Linux, macOS and Android operating systems.
about.special_credit: Special credit: The Vita3K icon was designed by:
about.github_website: If you're interested in contributing, check out our:
about.vita3k_website: Visit our website for more info:
about.ko-fi_website: If you want to support us, you can make a donation or subscribe to our:

delete.app_delete: This application and all related data, including saved data, will be deleted.
delete.app_delete_description: Deleting an application may take a while, depending on its size and your hardware.
delete.addcont_delete: Do you want to delete this add-on data?
delete.license_delete: Do you want to delete this license?
delete.saved_data_delete: Do you want to delete this saved data?

application.name: Application
application.delete: The selected applications and all related data, including saved data, will be deleted.

saved_data.name: Saved Data
saved_data.delete: The selected saved data items will be deleted.

controllers.name: Controllers
Name
controllers.not_connected: No compatible controllers connected. Please connect a controller that is compatible with SDL2.
controllers.use_custom_color_description: Check this box to use custom color for the controller's LED.

controls.name: Controls
controls.toggle_touch_description: Toggles between back touch and screen touch.
controls.toggle_gui_visibility_description: Toggles between showing and hiding the GUI at the top of the screen while the app is running.
controls.error_duplicate_key: The key is used for other bindings or it is reserved.

delete.cancel_deleting: Do you want to cancel deleting?
delete.delete_saved_data: Do you want to delete this saved data?

load.name: Load
load.cancel_loading: Do you want to cancel loading?
load.load_saved_data: Do you want to load this saved data?

save.name: Save
save.cancel_saving: Do you want to cancel saving?
save.could_not_save: Could not save the file. There is not enough free space on the memory card.
save.not_free_space: There is not enough free space on the memory card.
save.save_the_data: Do you want to save the data?
save.warning_saving: Saving... Do not power off the system or close the application.
save.overwrite_saved_data: Do you want to overwrite this saved data?

indicator.app_added_home: The application has been added to the home screen.

initial_setup.completed_setup: You have now completed initial setup. Your Vita3K system is ready!
initial_setup.install_highly_recommended: Installing both firmware files is highly recommended.
initial_setup.info_bar_description: Check the box to show info bar inside app selector. Info bar is clock, battery level and notification center.
initial_setup.live_area_screen_description: Check the box to open Live Area by default when clicking on an application. If disabled, right click on an application to open it.
initial_setup.apps_list_grid_description: Check the box to set the app list to grid mode like of PS Vita.

firmware_install.no_font_exist: No firmware font package present, please download and install it.
firmware_install.firmware_font_package_description: Firmware font package is needed for some applications and also for Asian regional font support. (Generally Recommended)

pkg_install.copy_paste_zrif: Ctrl (Cmd) + C to copy, Ctrl (Cmd) + V to paste.
pkg_install.failed_install_package: Failed to install package. Please check pkg and work.bin/rif file or zRIF key.

archive_install.not_compatible_content: No compatible content found in {} archive(s):

license_install.failed_install_license: Failed to install license. Please check work.bin/rif file or zRIF key.

reinstall.reinstall_overwrite: Do you want to reinstall it and overwrite existing data?

help.control_setting: Using configuration set for keyboard in control setting
help.firmware_not_detected: Firmware not detected. Installation is highly recommended
help.firmware_font_not_detected: Firmware font not detected. Installing it is recommended for font text in Live Area
help.browse_app_control: D-pad, Left Stick, Wheel in Up/Down or using Slider
help.start_app_control: Click on Start or Press on Cross
help.show_hide: Show/Hide Live Area during app run
help.exit_livearea_control: Click on Esc or Press on Circle
help.browse_page_control: D-pad, Left Stick, Wheel in Up/Down or using Slider, Click on </>
help.hide_show_control: Left Click or Press on Triangle
help.exit_manual_control: Click on Esc or Press on PS

settings_dialog.name: Settings

core.name: Core
core.no_modules: No modules present. Please download and install the last PS Vita firmware.

cpu.cpu_opt_description: Check the box to enable additional CPU JIT optimizations.

gpu.select_gpu: Select the GPU Vita3K should run on.
gpu.v_sync_description: Disabling V-Sync can fix the speed issue in some games. It is recommended to keep it enabled to avoid visual tearing.
gpu.surface_sync_description: Speed hack, check the box to disable surface syncing between CPU and GPU. Surface syncing is needed by a few games. Gives a big performance boost if disabled (in particular when upscaling is on).
gpu.async_pipeline_compilation_description: Allow pipelines to be compiled concurrently on multiple concurrent threads. This decreases pipeline compilation stutter at the cost of temporary graphical glitches.
gpu.internal_resolution_upscaling_descriptio: Enable upscaling for Vita3K. Experimental: games are not guaranteed to render properly at more than 1x.
gpu.anisotropic_filtering_description: Anisotropic filtering is a technique to enhance the image quality of surfaces which are sloped relative to the viewer. It has no drawback but can impact performance.
gpu.shader_cache_description: Check the box to enable shader cache to pre-compile it at game startup. Uncheck to disable this feature.
gpu.spirv_shader_description: Pass generated Spir-V shader directly to driver. Note that some beneficial extensions will be disabled, and not all GPUs are compatible with this.
gpu.fps_hack_description: Game hack which allows some games running at 30 FPS to run at 60 FPS on the emulator. Note that this is a hack and will only work on some games. On other games, it may have no effect or make them run twice as fast.

audio.name: Audio
audio.audio_volume_description: Adjusts the volume percentage of all audio outputs.
audio.ngs_description: Uncheck the box to disable support for advanced audio library NGS.

system.name: System
system.select_enter_button: Enter button assignment Select your 'Enter' button.
system.enter_button_description: This is the button that is used as 'Confirm' in applications dialogs. Some applications don't use this and get default confirmation button.
system.pstv_mode_description: Check the box to enable PS TV Emulated mode.
system.show_mode_description: Check the box to enable Show mode.
system.demo_mode_description: Check the box to enable Demo mode.

emulator.name: Emulator
emulator.archive_log_description: Check the box to enable Archive Log.
emulator.discord_rich_presence: Enables Discord Rich Presence to show what application you're running on Discord.
emulator.texture_cache_description: Uncheck the box to disable texture cache.
emulator.compile_shaders_description: Uncheck the box to disable the display of the compile shaders dialog.
emulator.touchpad_cursor_description: Uncheck the box to disable showing the touchpad cursor on-screen.
emulator.log_compat_warn_description: Check the box to enable log compatibility warning of GitHub issue.
emulator.check_for_updates_description: Automatically check for updates at startup.
emulator.performance_overlay_description: Display performance information on the screen as an overlay.
emulator.select_detail: Select your preferred perfomance overlay detail.
emulator.select_position: Select your preferred perfomance overlay position.
emulator.case_insensitive: Check to enable case-insensitive path finding on case sensitive filesystems. RESETS ON RESTART
emulator.case_insensitive_description: Allows emulator to attempt searching for files regardless of case on non-Windows platforms.
emulator.change_emu_path_description: Change Vita3K emulator folder path. You will need to move your old folder to the new location manually.
emulator.reset_emu_path_description: Reset Vita3K emulator path to the default. You will need to move your old folder to the new location manually.

gui.name: GUI
gui.gui_description: Check the box to show GUI after booting an application.
gui.info_bar_description: Check the box to show an info bar inside the app selector.
gui.display_info_message_description: Uncheck the box to display info message in log only.
gui.display_system_apps_description: Uncheck the box to disable the display of system apps on the home screen. They will be shown in the main menu bar only.
gui.live_area_screen_description: Check the box to open the Live Area by default when clicking on an application. If disabled, right click on an application to open it.
gui.stretch_the_display_area_description: Check the box to enlarge the display area to fit the screen size.
gui.apps_list_grid_description: Check the box to set the app list to grid mode.
gui.asia_font_support_description: Check this box to enable font support for Chinese and Korean. Enabling this will use more memory and will require you to restart the emulator.
gui.firmware_font_package_description: Firmware font package is needed for some applications and also for Asian regional font support in GUI. It is also generally recommended for GUI.
gui.select_background_alpha: Select your preferred background transparency. The minimum is opaque and the maximum is transparent.
gui.select_delay_background: Select the delay (in seconds) before changing backgrounds.
gui.select_delay_start: Select the delay (in seconds) before returning to the start screen.

network.name: Network
network.psn_signed_in_description: If checked, games will consider the user is connected to the PSN network (but offline).
network.enable_http_description: Check this box to enable games to use the HTTP protocol on the internet.
network.timeout_attempts_description: How many attempts to do when the server doesn't respond. Could be useful if you have very unstable or VERY SLOW internet.
network.timeout_sleep_description: Attempt sleep time when the server doesn't answer. Could be useful if you have very unstable or VERY SLOW internet.
network.read_end_attempts_description: How many attempts to do when there isn't more data to read, lower can improve performance but can make games unstable if you have bad enough internet.
network.read_end_sleep_description: Attempt sleep time when there isn't more data to read, lower can improve performance but can make games unstable if you have bad enough internet.

debug.log_active_shaders_description: Log shaders being used on each draw call.
debug.log_uniforms_description: Log shader uniform names and values.

settings_dialog.keep_changes: Click on Save to keep your changes.

trophy_collection.trophy_deleted: This trophy information saved on this user will be deleted.
trophy_collection.name: Name
trophy_collection.no_trophies: There are no trophies. You can earn trophies by using an application that supports the trophy feature.

user_management.user_created: The following user has been created.
user_management.user_name_used: This name is already in use.
user_management.user_delete: Select the user you want to delete.
user_management.user_delete_msg: The following user will be deleted.
user_management.user_delete_message: If you delete the user, that user's saved data, trophies will be deleted.
user_management.user_delete_warn: The user will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
user_management.name: Name

vita3k_update.name: Vita3K Update
vita3k_update.new_version_available: A new version of Vita3K is available.
vita3k_update.cancel_update: Do you want to cancel the update?
vita3k_update.downloading: Downloading... After the download is complete, Vita3K will restart automatically and then install the new update.
vita3k_update.update_vita3k: Do you want to update Vita3K?
vita3k_update.later_version_already_installed: The later version of Vita3K is already installed.
vita3k_update.latest_version_already_installed: The latest version of Vita3K is already installed.

welcome.name: Welcome to Vita3K
welcome.about_vita3k: Vita3K is an open-source PlayStation Vita emulator written in C++ for Windows, Linux, macOS and Android.
welcome.development_stage: The emulator is still in its development stages so any feedback and testing is greatly appreciated.
welcome.about_firmware: To get started, please install the PS Vita firmware and font packages.
welcome.vita3k_quickstart: A comprehensive guide on how to set-up Vita3K can be found on the
welcome.check_compatibility: Consult the Commercial game and the Homebrew compatibility list to see what currently runs.
welcome.discord_help: Additional support can be found in the #help channel of the
welcome.no_piracy: Vita3K does not condone piracy. You must dump your own games.
